name: ritim.info
short_description:
ritim is a clever Content Management System. It's a fresh breaking point in markets. You may create, edit, publish and manage content easily. Script comes with news management system.

ritim.info is an easy to use website content management system. Software helps content managers to create and maintain their websites fast and efficiently.

System is fully browser based user interface configurable editors for structured content with well defined fields. Also web content can be modified or created using an integrated WYSIWYG editor similar to well known office applications.
